atk-s0304a3:2_1: Jambukhādakasaṁyutte jambukhādako paribbājakoti evaṁnāmo therassa bhāgineyyo channaparibbājako.
atk-s0304a3:2_2: Yo kho āvuso rāgakkhayoti nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgo khīyati,
atk-s0304a3:3_0: Yo pana imināva suttena kilesakkhayamattaṁ nibbānanti vadeyya,
atk-s0304a3:3_7: Kiṁ pana gotrabhuñāṇakkhaṇe kilesā khīṇā khīyanti khīyissantīti?
atk-s0304a3:3_10: Kiṁ pana tesu akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu gotrabhuñāṇaṁ kilesakkhayaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karotīti?
atk-s0304a3:4_1: Maggakkhaṇepi hi kilesā “khīṇā”ti vā “khīyissantī”ti vā na vattabbā,
atk-s0304a3:4_3: na ca akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu kilesakkhayo ārammaṇaṁ hoti,
atk-s0304a3:4_7: Taṁ panetaṁ “rūpino dhammā arūpino dhammā”tiādīsu dukesu arūpino dhammāti saṅgahitattā na kilesakkhayamattamevāti.
atk-s0304a3:6_1: Arahattapañhabyākaraṇe yasmā arahattaṁ rāgadosamohānaṁ khīṇante uppajjati,
atk-s0304a3:8_0: 316-328.Teloke sugatāti te rāgādayo pahāya gatattā suṭṭhu gatāti sugatā.
atk-s0304a3:8_1: Dukkhassa kho āvuso pariññatthanti vaṭṭadukkhassa parijānanatthaṁ.
atk-s0304a3:10_1: Naciraṁ āvusoti āvuso dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhu “pāto anusiṭṭho sāyaṁ visesamadhigamissati,
atk-s0304a3:10_2: sāyaṁ anusiṭṭho pāto visesamadhigamissatī”ti vuttattā ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirassaṁ lahuyeva arahaṁ assa,
